Julie Andrews

Timeline of Julie Andrew's Life

  • October 1, 1936 - Born in Surrey, United Kingdom
  • September 30, 1954 - First American Stage Debut
  • August 27, 1964 - Screen debut in "Mary Poppins"
  • March 2, 1965 - Stars in "The Sound of Music"
  • October 25, 1995 - Stars in "Victor/Victoria"
  • February 10, 2011 - Receives Lifetime Achievement

Learn more about the wonderful life of Julie Andrews here.
